title: Looking for Dynamic Group Teammates (Plat-Diamond)
body:
Soon the Dynamic Group (Premade Ranked) will be going live. I'm looking for a team that are preferably **plat 4 **-** diamond 4**. I'm currently a top main so any other roles other than top would be awesome. I honestly think the dynamic group is going to be really good and I think you will be able to climb pretty easily with it anyways if you want to hit me up just send me a friend request.

Also we could eventually branch off into a ranked 5's team if everything goes well.
